department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Tutorial-Junior Year
course.faculty_text: Verena A. Conley and members of the Department
course.description: Weekly individual instruction for juniors pursuing a thesis honors track in French and Francophone Studies, culminating in the writing of a 20-25 page research paper in French.
course.notes: Successful completion of one term of French 98 or equivalent is required of all thesis-track honors concentrators in French and Francophone Studies.
